summary: 获取SQL任务调度详情日志。

schema.description: SQL任务ID，可通过调用接口[ListDBTaskSQLJob](~~207049~~)获取该参数的值。
租户ID，可通过调用接口[GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~)获取该参数的值。

Success.description:
请求是否成功，返回值如下：
- **true**：请求成功
- **false**：请求失败

ErrorMessage.example: JobId is mandatory for this action.

responseDemo:
[{"type":"json","example":"{
  "RequestId": "4AC23904-55DE-550B-9676-E8946F07****",
  "Success": true,
  "ErrorMessage": "JobId is mandatory for this action.",
  "ErrorCode": "MissingJobId",
  "Log": "log_****"
}","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":"<GetDBTaskSQLJobLogResponse>

</Log>

</GetDBTaskSQLJobLogResponse>","errorExample":""}]
title: 获取SQL任务日志
